The researcher of the Quran, which is all, gathered a cotton, with the bridge of the barefish, which is the result of the fruit.Its plot of it is for him because the source does not strive to collect it and his saying is a condemnation of any relative, and the man is responsible for it, and he said as he said, as he said the Bin of the Bin About him.And some of them said: It is realized by the standing, the base, and the rumor, in which it is from its tree, and it is permissible for it to be the intended of the release and the one who is the one who said: I did not return their hands from after it after not a thorns, and explain the debt on it with the ease of entry.
